titleStmt.title: A sermon of the prouidence of God Preached at Paules Crosse, the 25. of October. 1607. By Iohn Pelling Bacchalaur of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, John, 1561 or 2-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Nathaniell Butter, dwelling at the signe of the Pide Bull neere S. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Pide Bull neere S. Austins gate
